More <a href=\"http://www.scotcourts.gov.uk/about-the-scottish-court-service/scs-news/2015/09/22/launch-of-personal-injury-court-and-sheriff-appeal-court\"><strong>information is available</strong></a>&nbsp;on the new All-Scotland Sheriff Personal Injury Court and the Sheriff Appeal Court.</p> <p>&nbsp;</p> <br>\n\n\n</div></div></div></div><div class=\"sf_cols\">\n    <div Summary Criminal Court Procedure”&nbsp;published in February 2017. &nbsp; This paper proposes a new core model for summary court procedure which places digital technology and strong case management at the heart of the process.<br> <br> <a href=\"/docs/default-source/SCS-Communications/epr---a-new-model-for-summary-criminal-court-procedure.pdf?sfvrsn=7\" title=\"Evidence and Procedure
